column1: Borin was the younger son of [[Kings of Durin's Folk
column2: King]] [[Náin II]]. During his youth, the [[House of Durin]] lived in the [[Dragons
column3: dragon]]-plagued [[Grey Mountains]] that were ruled by his brother [[Dáin I]].

column1: When the King and his son [[Frór]] were slain by a [[Cold-drake]], Durin's folk divided. Borin followed the new King [[Thrór]] back to [[Lonely Mountain]], while others followed [[Grór]] to the [[Iron Hills]]. Borin lived with the [[Dwarves of Erebor]] under [[King under the Mountain
column2: King]] Thrór for the rest of his life.
